strings.ES_CROCO_SPECIAL_PURGE_UGPRADED_DESCRIPT: <style=cIsHealing>Poisonous.</style> Inflict damage on all <style=cIsHealing>poisoned</style> or <style=cIsDamage>blighted</style> enemies in range, dealing either <style=cIsHealing>300% + 15% of their max health</style> or <style=cIsDamage>450% per stack</style>, depending on <style=cIsUtility>passive selection</style>.
strings.ES_TREEBOT_SPECIAL_ROOT_UPGRADED_DESCRIP: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Slow</style> yourself, but gain <style=cIsUtility>adaptive</style> for up to 8 seconds.  While active, deal <style=cIsDamage>250% damage</style> per second to nearby enemies, gaining <style=cIsHealing>barrier</style> per enemy hit and <style=cIsDamage>pulling them towards you</style>.  Afterwards, release a blast that deals <style=cIsDamage>75% damage</style> for every pulse that hit an enemy.
strings.ES_MERC_SPECIAL_SLASHPORT_UPGRADED_DESCR: <style=cIsDamage>Slayer</style>. Target an enemy to <style=cIsUtility>expose, teleport to</style> and <style=cIsDamage>strike</style> them for <style=cIsDamage>1400% damage</style>, <style=cIsUtility>stunning</style> nearby enemies.
